summary: Tested Spotlight Tour feature for ForgeVoice Studio. All 11 test cases passed. Tour navigation, visual elements, and localStorage persistence all working correctly.
passed_tests: Help (?) icon visible in header next to bell icon
Clicking help icon starts tour at step 1
Tour shows dark overlay (65% opacity) with spotlight cutout on target element
Golden glow border animates around spotlight (animate-spotlight-glow class)
SVG mask (#spotlight-mask) creates proper cutout effect
Golden glow filter (#golden-glow) applied to spotlight border
Tooltip shows step number (Step X of 8), title, and description
Next button advances to next step correctly
Back button goes to previous step correctly
Tour progresses through all 8 steps: KPIs, Pipeline, Sidebar, Submissions, Strategy Lab, FVS System, Publishing, Notifications
Skip (X) button closes tour and sets localStorage flag
Finish button on last step closes tour and sets localStorage flag
localStorage 'fvs_tour_completed' flag set when tour completed/skipped
Tour does NOT auto-start after page refresh when localStorage flag is set
All data-tour attributes present on target elements (11 elements found)
critical_code_review_comments: SpotlightTour component properly uses React Portal (createPortal) for overlay rendering
SVG mask technique correctly creates spotlight cutout effect
Golden glow animation defined in index.css with animate-spotlight-glow class
Tooltip positioning uses calculatePosition function with viewport boundary clamping
localStorage persistence implemented correctly with STORAGE_KEY constant
Fallback selectors provided for each tour step in case primary selector fails
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Tour auto-start logic checks user.onboardingComplete === false
context_for_next_testing_agent: Spotlight Tour feature fully implemented and tested. Tour has 8 steps covering KPIs, Pipeline, Sidebar Nav, Submissions, Strategy Lab, FVS System, Publishing, and Notifications. localStorage key 'fvs_tour_completed' is used for persistence. Help button in header triggers tour. All data-tour attributes are in place on target elements.
